content: through the leaves by sostype @ ravelry sep 2022 through the leaves by sostype @ ravelry sizes & measure needles s m l xl xxl 3 5mm circular needles for bottom /neck sample in size m /sleeves ribbings 4mm circular needles for the main part of bust circumference the body 112 120 128 136 144 cm/ 4 5mm circular needles for the leaves 44 47 50 54 57 cable pattern body length or use the size of needles that obtained the 49 50 51 52 53 cm/ same gauge 19 3 19 7 20 1 20 5 20 9 gauge yarn 22 stsand 30 row = 10cm in stockinette sandnes garn line with needle size 4mm 53% cotton 33% viscose 14% linen 50gr/skein = 110 m/ 120 yard 7 7 8 8 9 skeins other tools cable needle markers stitch holder or waste yarn 2 through the leaves notes rnd13~48 repeat rnd1~12 for another 3 times -12 stsincreased total 242 258 274 290 310 sts this tee is knitted from bottom to top it s knitted in circular for the body and keep bor marker and remove other markers separate front and back piece at the arm hole and then work in flat front and back pieces are adjust length seamed together at the shoulder top and then knit for another 10 12 14 16 20 rnds pick up and finish the neck and sleeves measures 27 28 29 30 32 cm/10 6 11 0 11 4 11 8 12 2 from the cast on edge this tee is in at crop length if you need to adjust the body length you may add/decrease * add/decrease rounds at this step if you need to rounds at adjust length step adjust the length of the body instructions separate front and back bottom ribbing k 121 129 137 145 155 front piece using 3 5mm needles put the rest 121 129 137 145 155 stson stitch holder or waste yarn back piece cast on 224 240 256 272 292 stsin circular for 1*1 ribbing place bor marker front piece work in 1*1 ribbing until it measures 8cm/3 1 work in flat from the cast on edge row 0 ws p to end body row 1 rs k to end row 2 ws p to end change to 4mm needles repeat row 1~2 for another 3 times end with set up round ws total 121 129 137 145 155 sts k 20 20 20 20 20 pm k 36 40 44 48 53 m1l k 36 40 44 48 53 pm k 40 40 40 40 40 pm k 36 40 44 48 53 m1l left front k 36 40 44 48 53 pm k to bor -2sts increased total 226 242 258 274 follow chart 1 294 sts if encounter only 1 stsof 1/1 lc/rc at the beginning or ending sts please knit 1 instead rnd1~11 knit round rnd12 k to m sl m1l k to m m1r sl *2 k start
